"That is a good idea, although we might want to be careful to make 
sure the virus does not spread to your spark." Kenzo stated "We 
should install a virus protection program into your core proccesser, 
I have such programming in the med lab."

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Elita:
> 
> Elita giggled and babbled a loud. She liked play a while and stay 
> with her dady

a

file

programming.
